subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Scenes from the Iroquois Steeplechase in Nashville, where Arcadius, an 8-year-old gelding, collapsed and died soon after leaving the winner’s circle.
snippet: Scenes from the Iroquois Steeplechase in Nashville, where Arcadius, an 8-year-old gelding, collapsed and died soon after leaving the winner’s circle.
